name: Telehealth; privacy, security, and confidentiality
text: [§457-17]  Telehealth; privacy, security, and confidentiality.  [Section effective January 1, 2017.]  Services relating to the practice of nursing provided by telehealth pursuant to this chapter shall be consistent with all federal and state privacy, security, and confidentiality laws. [L 2016, c 226, §3]
